summary: A runaway girl is interviewed by a psychiatrist after a suicide attempt and her story is shown in subsequent flashbacks, accompanied by the music of Marillion's concept album 'Brave'.
cast: Josie Ayers|Russell Copley|Raymond Sawyer|Anthony Story|Jema Hewitt|Nat Lerner|Louise Blaine|Caroline O'Neill|Leroy|Tom Geoghegan|Eamon Geoghegan|Michael Hodgson|Steve Hogarth|Steve Rothery|Pete Trewavas|Mark Kelly|Ian Mosley|Nat Hemisphere|Anne O'Neill|Mark Kelly|Chris McHallem|Richard Stanley
title: Brave
